alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 8:38PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and south central Broward Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 838 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Miccosukee Resort, or 15 miles southwest of Miramar, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... The Redland, Kendall, Richmond West, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, West Kendall, Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, Miccosukee Resort, Zoo Miami, The Crossings, Tamiami, The Hammocks, Richmond Heights, Princeton, Kendall West, Inlikita, Three Lakes, South Miami Heights and Palmetto Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
